TEXT.TITLE: REYNOLDS AND REYNOLDS <REYNA> TO FIGHT SUIT
TEXT.BODY: The Reynolds and Reynolds Co said it will fight a suit filed against it by <Advanced Voice Technologies> alleging misappropriation of trade secrets. The company reiterated its denial of the charges, stating there was no merit for the suit. The company said it will file a response to the suit with Federal court in Detroit by April 7. Reuter
